title.narrative: Report on use of grant DME0123642 For the period 1-5-2016 – 31-12-2016

description.narrative: As stated in the letter by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, dated November 28, 2016, (reference numbers IGG-2016-814970 / ENV-2016.10219, this note provides an analytical narrative progress report for the period 1-5-2016 to 31-12-2016
